['Total quiet, which is not as easy as it sounds in Seattle.', 'The home was absolutely stunning, and Judith was more than welcoming and friendly.  ', 'Close to a great market, bike shop, Alki beach (which is just the greatest place in Seattle), and lots of shops, restaurants and bars.  
', 'Easy to ride a bike from her home, down Alki Beach and to downtown.  
', 'so I was catching the water taxi into town, which was a real treat', "so keep that in mind if you're not driving.

", 'Quiet, spacious, private and with Judith you are graced by a host is who is both worldly and down to earth.', 'Sorry again for the surprise dog and working with us to make it comfortable for everyone.', 'She knows the area very well.  ', 'Judith also provided us with fresh towels and access to her kitchen and intriguing conversation.  ', 'The house itself is spacious and clean, and Judith was very open to us sharing all of the common space on the first floor (kitchen, dining, living room).', 'The guest suite has a comfortable bed, a huge bathroom (both super clean).', 'It really is good to have a car...', "are all very friendly and easygoing, also won't disturb u anytime.", 'She is a graceful woman who can take good care of herself and the guests.', 'The responsible and positive attitude to life can gives u a very wonderful feeling.', 'Judith also have a good taste in art.', 'Judith is an amazing host and very friendly person.', 'The house is a short walk to the public transportation  - water taxi shuttle or city bus, couple minutes down to Alki beach and surrounding restaurants.  
 
', 'Judith was warm and welcoming--her house is fantastic', 'Comfy bed, clean and roomy accommodations', 'The interior is very well maintained and spacious.', 'There is also a well furnished kitchen which is great if you want to fix some breakfast in the morning or, as a tourist, fix a bite to eat at the end of a long day.', "Everything about Judith's place is amazing, she's the kind of host I hope to find at airbnb.", 'The home was well maintain and clean with wonderful views easy access to food and entertainment.', 'Judith made sure that I had everything I needed including special dinners with friends.', "Everything about my experience in Judith's home was top-notch.  ", 'The house itself was clean, well-maintained, and comfortable.  ', 'Communication with Judith was easy and companionable.  ', 'soon!Judith is a most graceful & warm host - very open, extremely easy to talk to, and very welcoming to her guests. 

', "Judith's place is beautiful and cozy with a comfortable en suite/office arrangement.", "It is just as beautiful as advertised, and Judith's graciousness and her warm welcome were terrific.", 'The  home is beautiful and our was very cosy and clean.', "Gorgeous place - it's crazy to think the house is only 20 mins or so from downtown!", 'The view overlooking the water is worth it alone, but Judith is a super accommodating host, and great for a chat on a rainy day!We were looking for a quiet place to celebrate our anniversary and the views and the home certainly lent themselves to a great celebration.', 'We saw seals playing in the bay and sunset over the water.', 'There are good local restaurants and the city is just a 10 minute boat ride away.', 'Perfect for anyone who wants both the city and the outdoors.', 'She was a very pleasant housemate to live with.', 'so I was a bit nervous about how everything works.  ', 'Judith was a very gracious host and her home was truly a mark of beauty on the West Seattle hillside.  ', 'The house was everything and more than I get out of a hotel stay so', 'Everything was placed neatly to accommodate anything a  traveler/visitor could want.  ', 'A nice breakfast bar, table, reading nooks, and the front deck of course!  ', 'All very quaint!  ', "Very decorative and the pictures don't lie,", 'YOU!Judith is a very special woman who, very luckily for us, is sharing her very special home.  ', 'Alki Beach is wonderful and a very nice change of pace from downtown Seattle.

', 'She is an amazing host, super friendly, knowledgable and very funny.', 'here!Judith was a very friendly, generous, and accommodating host.', 'This was a great place to stay, beautiful view, and a very welcoming hostess.  ', 'We were in the area for a family wedding, Judith was very gracious, allowing my son and stay in the afternoon between the wedding and the reception.  ', 'She is warm, friendly, intelligent and funny.  ', 'Our room  had a comfortable bed and chair and a spacious private bath.  ', 'You are out of the city, but only a quick water taxi ride or car ride away.  ', "I wanted a nice place with Wifi and an ocean's view.
", 'Judith was nice, very helpful before my arrival.', 'but she was very accommodating.', 'She invited me to go to a very interesting event with her, she helped me for grocery shopping,...', 'And we had very pleasant moments together.', 'She is an easy drive to the shops and restaurants on California and we found staying here absolutely magical.

', 'The room and attached bath are on the main floor, everything was very clean and comfortable.  ', 'I would highly recommend her home for a great place to get away and relax!A very nice house, we loved the view!  ', 'Judith is a very nice person, a pleasure to stay at her home.

', 'It was perfect.  ', 'Sipping coffee in the morning with her and taking in the view from her deck is a perfect way to start the day.  ', 'Judith is a wonderful host, an amazing woman, and I can not say enough good things about her, her hospitality, and just the warm feeling', 'Everything is clean, comfortable, convenient, and the views of the sound in the morning (especially on sunny days) just make you feel happy all over!  ', "Don;t hesitate - book now!Judith's home is beautiful, peaceful, and so very relaxing - exactly as it appears in the pictures but even better because you can feel the breeze from the water, hear the birds, and enjoy the views from the huge glass windows (or even better, from the deck when the weather cooperates).  ", 'Judith is a delightful host who knows how to strike the perfect balance between interacting and allowing for privacy.  ', 'I stayed with her the week before I was moving and was very busy with work and details, and only wish I had more time to connect with her, but appreciated her allowing me the space I needed to focus on tasks while also relaxing.  ', "I didn't feel like I was intruding on someone else's space, and I also didn't feel like she was having to change her routine - really, a perfect balance.  ", 'Very easy to work with and condiderate.  ', 'The house has spectacular views and it is a very comfortable and clean place to stay.  ', 'Beautiful deck over the water, mountains with snow cap mountains, 15-20 minute walk to the beach!', 'The house was very architecturally unique, beautifully decorated, and the rooms were very clean.', 'Judith was very welcoming and treated us like a true guest.

', 'The profile for this place is very accurate.', 'Also, it was sunny and warm almost every day we were there.', 'Very relaxed environment both with Judith and when she is not there.', 'Judith’s home is neat, clean and inviting with shared space for visiting and private space for resting.   ', 'She had some good recommendations for my stay here and even drove me to the bus stop when I left!We had a fantastic time with', "Judith - she's smart, well read, full of energy and has a wicked sense of humour!  ", 'Very sad to leave as it felt like we were parting with a friend.', 'See you in Barcelona, Judith!I almost hate to share because I want to keep this spot for myself.', 'Highly recommend this suite + office and the owner is very helpful and accommodating.', 'The location is perfect for a lovely brunch and mid-day walk at Alki beach and an easy drive to downtown Seattle.  ', 'She was very accommodating and extremely helpful in guiding us to our journey around the city.', "Judith's house is very sweet and cute as well as full of light.", 'The entire house is completely soaked with the most beautiful sunset in the evening, if you are lucky with the weather.', 'Judith is a very engaging person and we had a lot of fun talking about a lot of things over wine and meals together.', 'The area is very quiet and remote so you need a car to get around, but I would definitely stay here again instead of the busy downtown area.', 'Bedroom is clean, comfy.', 'She was a warm, welcoming and humorous host.  ', 'And the postcard-perfect views from her home were beyond expectations!  ', 'A really gorgeous house, a superb view and a perfect host!
', 'This is perfect if you stay in Seattle, a corner of peace, silence, culture and light.
', 'We really had a very pleasant time there, and Judith’s home has been determinant.
', 'She truly cares that you have a nice stay, but even more, she is wonderful to get to know.  ', 'She had everything we needed for a comfortable, cozy stay in her beautiful home.  ', 'A 10 minute ferry from beautiful Alki Beach in her neighborhood is a fun and easy way to go to downtown Seattle.  ', 'The house is fabulous and the deck is the perfect spot for breakfast while watching ships go sailing by.', "It's also a tranquil location; a great place to think big thoughts without disturbance or outside intrusion.", "Judith's a wonderful host with a wealth of good books and music that you're welcome to share, With a little encouragement, she might even recite some Shakespearean sonnets or Persian poetry for you.", 'The room is very private, quiet, and comfortable.  ', 'Close by is a very good and very popular Italian restaurant -- an easy 7-minute', 'The Alki Beach / West Seattle neighborhood is a little gem that is often overlooked by visitors.', 'It has many interesting shops and good restaurants that will not disappoint.', 'Everything is exactly as it appears in the picture, however cannot capture just how beautiful it really is.  ', 'The room was comfortable and sparkling clean.  ', 'Judith is an amazing host and so very thoughtful.  ', 'and was the perfect host.', 'She welcomed us on arrival, and made certain that we had everything we needed.', 'The view of the Puget Sound is unbeatable, and we spent most of our time sitting on the deck looking out over the water and the Olympic range.', "The neighborhood is high on a hill, but it's an easy walk to Alki.", 'Located a few (hilly) blocks from Alki Beach, this wonderful house surrounded us with beauty, comfort, and peace while still allowing us to easily access downtown Seattle via water taxi, bus, or car.', 'Judith is the perfect hostess.', 'She made us feel very much at home, offering information and suggesting resources while allowing us to come and go at will.', 'Instead of that we got three very sunny days which we use to explore the city.', 'A beautiful comfortable home along with an even more precious lady.', 'Lovely host , comfortable home, extraordinary view.', 'If other hosts are as gracious and as interesting; if other airbnb homes are as comfortable and as beautiful; who could want to stay in a hotel?', 'Judith is one of a kind, managing to carry on her own life and still care for and care about her guests.', "Judith's home is beautiful and  the view is fantastic,How confortable that I stay here.", 'I have a good time staying at seattle,thanks Judith.', 'She was so nice.', 'She is warm and friendly.  ', 'Everything you require is there ready for you.  ', "There's also the neighbor, Gary, who was very nice and helpful as well. 

", "Judith's home is clean, in a safe convenient area,comfortable and very quiet.", 'There was a hot pot of coffee waiting for me each morning', 'Very nice house.', 'Judith was a very gracious host and was very sweet us.', 'Very bright, excellent view and comfortable bed.', 'The house was clean, very warm (underfloor heating and 2 fireplaces) and pictures are very accurate.  ', 'We had a changing, inflexible schedule and Judith was very accommodating.', "Judith has a very comfortable home (the bed was so cozy and wonderful, the bathroom was spotless and private) with many eclectic decorations and souvenirs from her life's travels-as well as a profound gift for hosting and making her guests feel welcome.", "Her rag doll cat, Kiri was also a pleasure to be around (my husband didn't think he liked cats until he was around Kiri).", 'The porch is big and comfortable and the house itself is spacious.', 'She was also very helpful with anything I wanted to know about Washington.

', 'Kiri, her cat is also very sweet and amusing.', 'Staying at this utopia of a home, carefully and sensitively designed with details of personal history and a natural taste for comfort and spiritual wholeness – made our time go by with a peaceful smile and many good random fortunes gravitating our way with every new day. 
', 'We had everything we needed at our disposal and savored the magnificent sunsets, the greens and blues and spring flowers that surrounded us.      
', 'Thank you Judith for everything and be sound,
               Einat & Niv
', 'Judith is a very nice, friendly hostess.', 'She loves her life, enjoys friends and traveling, makes her house so warm and beautiful.', 'The view was amazing and Judith is pretty nice and kind.', 'By the way, thank you for nice tea.', 'The bedroom is neat and clean, and you can find a lot of beautiful artworks.', 'We like the window, Kiri (a cute cat), the plant judith have been working on ...', 'well, we like almost everything. 

', 'Regarding the host: Judith is a very kind lady, who picked up us at the train station and always glad to have a conversation.', 'She was kind enough to share books and ideas for our day trips in Seattle and introduce us to her neighbor to learn more about hiking trails.

', 'It was never easy to leave Seattle after the stay :)', 'Very comfortable and the view is outstanding.', 'Judith was warm and welcoming and her beautiful home is as it appears in description and pictures.  ', 'The bedroom, bath and office area was perfect for our needs.', 'Judith and her house give me a beautiful memory in Seattle!Judith is really nice and helpful.', 'I keep on troubling her these days', "The minute my GPS led me down the road to Judith's house after a 10 hour day of training was just what I needed..", "The road leading up to Judith's is a treat as you are right down by the water (Puget sound) and it relaxed me even before I got to her house.", 'The listing description was accurate--view was fantastic and living room and kitchen very warm and comfortable ....', 'our bedroom and bathroom were "dated" but comfortable--bed needs to be updated to Kingsize and bathroom was minimum ....', 'host was very charming and warm/caring ....', 'She was very kind and ensured we had everything we needed.', 'The house itself was gorgeous, and getting to stay there was very much a pleasure; her view from her front porch is the sort that soothes the soul. 

', 'The room was comfortable and the bed was warm - we slept very well.', 'The bath was clean and lovely.', "Seattle is an easy water taxi ride, drive, or Uner/Lyft from the city, if you're worried about the distance.", 'Me and my girlfriend stayed with Judith over the labor day weekend and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.', 'The house is very well managed and has great collection of books and varied art.', 'Due to our packed schedule we came home late pretty much on all nights but she was very accomodating.', 'Judith is pure class and was very welcoming.', 'The main house, common area rooms are all beautiful, spacious, clean and comfortable AND THE VIEW!', 'Tranquil night sleep in the Suite room and good strong coffee in the morning.', 'While it was good to have a place to lay our sleepy heads, the pleasant surprise was the great time getting to know our hostess.']

['The room was most comfortable and it was pleasure to be able to sit on the patio next to their lovely pond and beautiful landscaping.  ', 'Marylou N.Our stay was perfect.  ', 'The room was comfortable and the breakfast Barb set out each morning', 'The patio was perfect for coffee in the early morning.  ', 'Great, friendly hosts!  ', 'The room was great, there is a huge selection of breakfast foods and the location is perfect for getting into town quickly and easily.  ', 'Easy access to public transportation.  ', 'Barbara and Steve offered friendly hospitality together with a clean and peaceful environment.  ', 'When we came stumbling along their street from the bus stop on the first night, after a long hard day of travel, Steve came down to meet us and see if we needed help with our bags.  ', 'Also, the neighborhood was very convenient and good for walking, with easy transportation to downtown or anywhere we needed to go.

', 'Home-made muffins, tarts, good coffee, fresh flowers.', 'This is the true Seattle experience combining the good things in life - art, nature and some really great hospitality.  ', 'They were very caring hosts and we also enjoyed some interesting conversations.

', 'The room was comfortable and I enjoyed falling asleep to the music of the fountain just outside the door!', 'Lovely house in quiet neighborhood, easy access to Green Lake, downtown, etc.', 'Very nice hosts, lovely strata for breakfast.', 'Very clean and comfortable room and shared bath.', 'We were very comfortable in their house.', 'Our room was clean, private, and really comfortable.  ', 'Steph and FrancoCozy room with very comfortable bed, TV and private entrance.', 'Everything was clean and the hosts were welcoming.', 'Nice neighbourhood with easy parking out front.', 'Additionally, she provided a wonderful breakfast for us that was completely unexpected.', 'Her home is located in a fantastic neighborhood very close to the University and the downtown area.', 'Most wonderful hosts - very helpful to me when my flights had been cancelled and gave me their laptops mobiles phones etc to sort out my problem.', 'Room was perfect and very homely - loved every part of my time with them.', 'overall everything was just fabulous - thank you', 'We had a lovely stay with Barb and Steve - they were welcoming and friendly, yet gave us plenty of privacy.  ', 'Our room was cozy and comfortable.  ', 'We stayed for a full week and had use of the kitchen for breakfast, laundry, and our own entrance, which was great.', 'Quiet, comfortable room with separate entrance.   ', "Didn't see much of them but hosts Barbara and husband Steve were easy to talk to and overall it was a welcoming environment.  ", 'My Hostess & Host were very endearing.', 'I stayed here for three nights in 2012, and the stay was very pleasant and enjoyable.  ', 'The room was clean, quiet, and private, the bed was incredibly comfortable, and the hosts were very pleasant folks.  ', 'They left us nice Breakfast with fruit, cereal, boiled eggs, PP&J, coffee, and more.', "Barb even cut us up fresh fruit and put it in containers with our names on them when she found out we're going hiking.

", 'The house was so neat, organized, and clean.
', 'They were very welcoming and made us feel right at home.', 'We were a little nervous about sharing a bathroom but it really was never a problem.', 'It is a great location to explore North Seattle and is very close to downtown Seattle as well.', 'We enjoyed walking to this funky gelato shop called The Fainting Goat in nearby Wallingford and were super close to several good restaurants.', 'We recently had the pleasure of staying here in Seattle and cannot say enough wonderful things about our hosts!  ', 'We were located just close enough to the city and our friends to make getting around incredibly simple.  ', 'The accommodations were clean and comfortable along with a lovely selection of breakfast items.  ', 'We would highly recommend this as a place to stay in Seattle should you be looking for a comfortable, beautiful, inviting place to stay!  ', 'Barb and Steve were extremely welcoming, friendly and respectful of our privacy (considering we were staying in their home).  ', 'At the same time, they were very helpful if we had questions about anything, needed anything, or just wanted advice or recommendations.  ', 'Barb was also very communicative in advance of the trip in order to help us plan.  ', 'Parking on the street outside was very convenient, and they provided a number of basic breakfast amenities for our convenience like fresh coffee, yogurt, fruit, etc., even offering to pick up our favorites!  ', "Finally, my wife says this may have been the most comfortable bed she's ever slept in :)   ", 'Thanks Barb and Steve!Barb and Steve have a beutiful house very convieniently located just north of Seattle.', "They were very welcoming and we're very helpful about things to do in the area.", 'They are both very friendly and ready to help with practical issues like busses or the location of nearby coffee houses.  ', 'The house is immaculate, the guest room is perfectly appointed (empty dresser drawers, a place for your suitcase, a page with all your possible questions already answered...), and the neighborhood is just charming.  ', "The house is easy to reach by public transportation, and there's plenty of room for parking.  ", 'Having my own entrance was very convenient and her husband Steve kindly let me put my bike in the garage and they offered lots of great options for breakfast which I was not expecting.  ', 'They are welcoming and friendly and their home is warm and peaceful with lots of natural light and tasteful decor.  ', 'The room is comfortable and has its own entry to the back--feels safe and private.', 'Room was very quiet, bed was comfortable and there was plenty of parking.  ', 'Barb is wonderful host and we felt very at home at her place.', 'The room was clean and bright, Barb even put fresh peonies in our room for us to enjoy.', 'There is a small Koi pond with a turtle and koi, it was nice having the door open at night and listening to the water. 

', "I would definitely recommend anyone to stay with Barb and Steve, they are lovely!Me and my wife enjoyed a lot for the past 8 days in Seattle and a big part of the enjoyment should be credited to Barbara's warm hospitality and hosting during those days we stay in her place. 

", 'Barbara and Steve created a very comfortable environment for us that makes us feel just like staying at home.', 'Barbara provided very good breakfast for us as well.', 'The house is neat with a wonderful garden filled with colorful flowers where we relax ourselves after coming back everyday.', "If you don't mind walking you can just go there on food since the neighborhood is also fantastic and very quite.", 'They made us feel very welcome.', 'They laid on a breakfast each morning with fresh fruits, yogurt, bread etc and we could also take it for lunch.

', 'The room is great, with its own private entrance out into the garden - perfect spot for eating your breakfast.

', 'The location was for us perfect as we attended a festival at the Chapel Performance Space which is literally 2 minutes away.', 'Within 5 minutes walk each side you have lots of very nice neighborhood bars and restaurants. 

', '- it was perfect!I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Barb & Steve.', 'They made me feel welcome and were very generous with breakfast.', 'Barb asks food preferences prior to arrival and the had everything I needed to start the day out with healthful breakfast.', 'While the guest room is small, there is plenty of space to lay out and store belongs making it easy to put the suitcase away and feel at home.', 'There are plenty of blankets of varying weight to chose from and Barb fou', 'The breakfast was also very good and had healthy options.', 'Great hosts, perfect accommodation and amenities working exactly as announced.', 'I had easy access to public transport to everywhere, but sometimes I chose walking rather than catching a bus just to see all the beauty around the neighborhood.

', "It's impossible not to relax listening to the water or just watching the fishes and the little turtle.", 'As a foreigner in a different culture you have to learn how to adapt, but Barbara and Steve were extremely kind and understanding during this process, providing me with a lot of information about 
the house, neighborhood and very useful tips regarding Seattle.', 'Barbara is a bright and conscientious host; friendly and engaging, but completely respectful of privacy.  ', 'The room is cozy and airy, with a comfortable bed.  ', 'The weather was fantastic during my stay, and it was the perfect place to eat breakfast, catch up on work, and read.  ', 'The private entrance allowed me to feel completely comfortable coming and going as I pleased.

', 'Barb was a great host, and provided nice details such as:  fresh flowers from the garden; assorted toiletries in case you forget something; and a compendium of Seattle travel info, maps, & bus schedules.  ', 'The pillow-top mattress, linens, and bath towels were high quality and comfortable.  ', 'The koi pond and back patio are a highlight as you can fall asleep listening to the water or close the slider and hear nothing.  ', 'Thank you, Barb, for a very nice', "Everything in the house was beautifully set up and comfortable and Barb's kitchen was well supplied with lots of breakfast makings.
", 'The location was an easy 5 minute drive from UW.  ', 'Barb was very fast and efficient with every communication and such a thoughtful host.', 'I can spend a whole day doing nothing but sit in her back yard by the pond!  ', 'The shared bathroom is bright, and the shared kitchen is stocked with everything needed for coffee and a quick breakfast.', 'The house was very nice and clean.  ', 'The neighborhood was quiet, and very close to a lot of fun places.  ', 'She oriented me to her neat and very clean house, and I was off to the ballpark.  ', 'Returning that night, I had a private entry to the bedroom for a good sleep in a quiet neighborhood.  ', 'While the coffee was brewing, I put together a breakfast of fresh fruit, cereal, muffin and yogurt.  ', 'Having a private entrance is really nice', "From  the moment we walked into Barbara's house, my daughter and I felt comfortable and welcomed.", 'The house is just charming, and perfectly located in a picture perfect community.  ', 'Barbara had Rainier cherries sitting on the nightstand upon our arrival, which was very thoughtful, exemplifying the type of hostess she is.
', 'The private entrance to our room was really a nice touch, as well as the total relaxation we felt sipping our coffee in the morning by the Koi pond!
', 'Barbara was very welcoming.', 'She was very flexible and easy to get in touch with when making check in an out arrangements.', 'The room was wonderful, clean comfortable very pleasant over all.






', 'The house is beautiful and very clean.', 'Barbara is a very attentive host who is ready to help, she helped them with Uber also.', 'The neighbourhood has all they need, easy connection to bus, groceries, asian foods etc.', "Barbara's home was warm and inviting, just as Barbara is.  ", 'The private entrance from the back garden to the guest room made for easy privacy.  ', 'I loved the bedroom leading out onto the patio, and the house was beautiful and comfortable.', 'The house was located near main roads, and made getting around Seattle very easy.', 'Barbara has a great sense of humor and is very accommodating to guests and their needs.', 'She also had fresh flowers in my room and asked me which type of milk, yogurt and fruit  I preferred before I arrived!  ', 'Very sensitive and kind woman and host and great experience!Barbara is a prefect hostess.', 'She made her home feel comfortable and we always felt welcome.', 'Basket full of maps and brochures about Seattle, another basket of toiletries for my use.  ', 'Able to do laundry, and come and go as I pleased, but Barbara was available to chatter and offer any needed assistance, including helping to mail my packages home!', 'Unbelievably comfortable "homecoming" before I had to head home again!!!  ', 'Safe, quiet neighborhood, full of lovely gardens and birdsong.  ', 'Easy public transport via SEATAC [LightRail] and Bus #16, which my hostess discovered and sent to me prior to my departure. ', 'This is a very clean and welcoming space in a quieter part of the city.', 'It was very clean and fresh smelling.  ', 'Great and very clean cottage in Columbia City (short walk from Rainier which has lots of nice restaurants/cafes) with a friendly host, which gave us very good tips for activities and restaurants for our short stay.', 'We loved the tranquil space of the cottage, which was clean, calm, and comfortable.', "We would love to visit again!Julie's cottage is clean, cozy and private with lots of sunlight and a friendly cat for company.", 'It was very clean and simple.', "The cottage itself couldn't have been cleaner or more attractive, and the garden -- gardens, really -- were a delight.", 'Julie is friendly and easy to deal with and her space is clean and comfortable.', 'The inside is clean, comfortable, and has details that make your stay that much better - dvds, books, tea, etc.', 'The cottage was beautiful, clean, and in a great location for nearby activities as well as access to downtown.', 'Very quiet, clean, smells great, and great hot tub.', 'The cottage was very clean and peaceful.\r\n\r\n', 'Clean, bright, comfy, and exactly what we were looking for.', "Julie's cottage is full of light, very clean and well represented by the photographs.", 'The room is comfortable and clean.', 'This cottage was a clean and cozy gem.  ', 'All of the small touches like tea maker, hair dryer in the bathroom, and clean soft sheets made it feel like home.  ', 'The space was clean, quite, and felt very private.', 'For starters the cottage is SO clean.', 'Coming from a bit of a clean freak, this is always such a delight.', 'Bathroom was tight but very clean and good water pressure.', "The cottage itself is clean, bright and we'll appointed and Julie is sweet and responsive.  ", 'The cottage itself is very cozy, clean and nicely decorated and is the perfect size for a traveling couple.', 'The space is calm, clean, and smells nice.', 'Everything was very clean and relaxing.', ', and the fresh, clean feel of the inside.', 'The cottage was clean and bright, and the hot tub was a wonderful way to relax after a day out on the town.', 'Everything in the cottage was clean and it was nicely appointed.', 'The cottage was just as described, clean, light, airy, very convenient to family and wedding we were attending.', 'Recommended!A spotlessly clean, sunny, open-plan cottage set in a meditative Japanese style garden.', 'So clean and nothing left undone and all the amenities you need and then some.', 'It was clean and cute.', 'Is very homey an extremely clean and well lit', 'and I loved that there are white Christmas lights neatly hung near the ceiling, they were a great addition!', 'It was a clean beautiful bright quiet place to relax and unwind.', 'The place was so clean and smelled amazing!', 'It is bright, cozy and extremely clean, with all the amenities one could need.', 'It was clean, private and comfortable.', 'Very clean, quiet, with peaceful vibes and a fantastic garden with several visiting bird species and a lovely view up the hill at night whilst sitting in the hot tub.', 'Everything was clean and lovely.', 'It was very clean, had everything we could have needed, and was very close to public transportation stops.', 'It was clean, and private.', 'Julie keeps the space immaculately clean and the layout is well thought-out.', 'The cottage was comfortable and clean, and offered a calm place to relax in her garden and hot tub.  ', 'It was cute, clean and had the most beautiful garden to enjoy!', 'Her place is so peaceful, clean, and airy.', 'Fast forward to the most amazing banana wet-cake with caramel dessert ever.', 'The cottage is clean, with a refrigerator, wifi, and great air conditioning.', 'It was clean and as you would excprect it.', 'The town the cottage is in is also very neat to explore!', 'The cottage was wonderfully decorated with lots of natural light and extremely clean.', 'Julie’s cottage is a nice, clean, peaceful, well-appointed place to stay.  ']

sents_0.5:
["Jessie's place was very nice and it was just recently remodeled, so there is  new everything!", 'Jessie did a great job designing the place and has a very artsy feel.', 'Jessie also left tea, beverages and everything else I needed during my stay.', 'Also the bed is very comfy!!', 'The pictures are nice but this place has way more to offer than the pictures show, I guarantee you will enjoy it here.', 'Easy to find, private and very clean.', 'Perfect for a weekend get away.', 'We will definitely keep her place at the top for our next visit.', 'Jessie at the Redstone abode is a great communicator and all-around nice lady.', 'She was quick to respond to all my emails and questions and when I had concerns she was very helpful.

', 'The apartment is gorgeous, very clean, chic furnishings and nice little extras to let you know', "It is well lit and you enter through a lovely courtyard (if you're lucky you might meet a very sweet pup!).", 'Jessie was really helpful in locating good places to drink coffee and eat good food.', 'The place is perfect--clean and well designed.', 'The location was perfect; close to restaurants, shops, good coffee and bars.  ', 'The little amenities (toiletries, Brita water filter, and towels/linens) were much appreciated!  ', 'Cell phone service was spotty when having conversations, but it was fine for texting.  ', 'The apartment is well-maintained and nicely designed.  ', 'It was tidy and quiet and had everything we needed for our stay.  ', 'We loved the location, Phinney Ridge is a beautiful neighborhood close to everything.', 'The apt was clean, smelled great, fully furnished with everything we needed.', 'Everything you need is included - separate entrance, wifi, kitchen, tv (with Netflix), shower, and a comfy bed.', "It's very spacious and has a full kitchen.  ", 'Although we were out most days and only briefly had time with Jessie we found her to be very helpful and accommodating and happy to recommend places to go, things to do.  ', 'It was clean, comfortable and we enjoyed everything about it.', "The apartment is pretty bright given that it's under ground", 'They had wonderful amenities with the extra added touches to set them apart - like glasses in the freezer for a frosty beer and a nice log waiting to be burned in the fireplace.', 'Very thoughtful!

', 'Phinney Ridge is a delightful, funky little town with lots of cool restaurants within walking distance.', 'I was surprised at how easy it was to find parking right near the house - bonus! 

', 'Very cool people indeed!great apartment in a fantastic location, and Jessie is a very thoughtful and accommodating host.  ', "The bed is incredibly comfortable, the area is fantastic, and the logistics couldn't have been easier.  ", 'It was clean and comfortable, and in a great location.', 'Easy access to Greenlake and highway 99 for a straight shot downtown.  ', 'Everything was great and enjoyed the Ballard area.', 'The apartment is super clean, tidy, stylish and spacious and its located in a nice neighbourhood uptown.', "There's lots of great restaurants (Gainsbourg was our fave), good coffee bars and a decent supermarket close by.", 'Perfect location for my girlfriend and I to relax after exploring Seattle all day.', 'The neighborhood is nice and quaint with some fantastic little restaurants and coffee shops a short walk from the apartment.', 'It was nice to have access to netflix and wifi on nights we wanted to stay in and re-energize for the next day.  ', 'If you are driving, the highways are close enough to make the journey downtown and elsewhere a piece of cake.  ', 'Jessie and the place were great--very responsive and downright kind to me and my guest who stayed there.  ', 'Though my first time in the city/state, I would have gladly spent more time at the house, curled up on the couch.  ', 'The bed was so soft, and the shower so hot, that I had trouble getting out of either.  ', 'Aside from the amazing decor/cleanliness, the location was perfect for a quick (email hidden), a hot cup of coffee, or a yummy dinner, all just a few steps away.  ', 'Easy access to downtown, Greenlake, and more.  ', 'Neat, clean, and easy to get to.', 'She provided all the information we need to get to her place along with helpful tips about where to eat and how to get around.  ', 'The apartment was even better than pictured...very clean and very comfortable!  ', 'Phinney Ridge is a charming neighborhood with a nice market and lots of good restaurants, coffee shops, and bars.  ', "We didn't rent a car and found it easy enough to get everywhere", 'I would highly recommend a stay here if you are visiting Seattle!Clean, updated, comfortable, and stylish basement apartment in a great neighborhood location, very close to shops, gallerys and cafes.', "Great value!Jessie's place was absolutely perfect.  ", 'There are plenty of places to walk and getting around Seattle is very easy.  ', 'i am a bit handicap after a broken ankle and I found her home blessed with good footing, sturdy railings and comforting out side lights.', 'As many have stated before the apartment has everything you could need to feel at home away from home.
', 'Although the place is a bit away from downtown there is a very good strip of bars and restaurants only a few minutes walk away.', 'Very spacious with everything you need.', "We stayed at Jessie's the 2nd week of October and it was perfect!", 'Clean, safe and the neighborhood is awesome.', 'Highly recommend it!Jessie has a great little place for one or a close two people.', 'Easy communications with Jessie and she has a comprehensive set of notes or house rules and offers useful suggestions for nearby coffee shops, restaurants, etc.', 'Easy address to locate and arrangements for checking in and out were clear and accurate.', 'it was really a great place to unwind during a very busy week.', 'the place is very cute, well located and nicely decorated.  ', 'First, there was only one roll of toilet paper, no paper towels, no dish sponge and very little shampoo.  ', 'Second, the fireplace did not work and made the apartment stink of smoke.  ', 'Third, despite being told that Verizon users had good service in the apartment we could never make our phones work and had to stand outside in the wet and cold to make phone calls.  ', 'Overall, we were very disappointed with our stay.', 'Very well decorated, and finished.', 'Great location with very easy access to downtown and all major parts of Seattle.', 'Laundry machines available.', 'Jessie was very communicative and the space was just as advertised.', 'Overall, a really nice play to stay in Seattle.', 'A clean & spacious 1-bedroom apt in a great neighborhood!  ', "It's a basement apt but very well-lit and colorful and has small upper windows for air.  ", 'Comfy bed, kitchen area with everything.  ', "Jessie's place is super clean, well kept and tastefully furnished.", "It's also good on more particular things like nice soap, a place to hang your clothes and good heat & water pressure.", 'Getting downtown by bus was easy.', "To start, Jessie's neighborhood is perfect.", 'North Greenwood has so many nice restaurants and a two of the best coffee shops in all of Seattle(Herkimer being my favourite)', "You're a short bus ride from Downtown and a pleasant walk downhill to Fremont and Ballard which are so so nice.", "Jessie obviously has a lot of aesthetic taste as the place is so nice the pictures don't even do it justice.", 'Great location to many fun neighborhoods in SEA - easy street parking and access to public transport.  ', 'Comfy bed, good water pressure.  ', 'If you have AT&T you will not get coverage while in the unit (basement) so keep that in mind if you intend to work during your stay.', 'Adorable place, easy access to downtown an great food.', 'The Redstone apartment was great - clean and spacious.', 'Phinney Ridge is really cool and has awesome views on a clear day.', 'Parking was super easy.', "The pictures Jessie posts about her place don't even do it justice: so cozy, cute, clean, feels like home, and in a great area.", 'but it gets heated instantly and is super comfortable.', 'Everything is brand new, wonderful shower pressure, very equiped kitchen to cook whatever you want and a perfectly working wifi. 

', "Really good time in Jessie's house.", 'The apartment was exactly as the pictures shows and she was a very nice host!  ', 'The neighborhood was amazing, the people was so nice', 'and there is a big market 3 blocks from the house where you can find everything you need.', 'There were very good bus connections to downtown and u-district as well.  ', "My personal recommendations: don't miss to try Red Mill Burger, go to Greelake and if you like wine try Conde Valdemar (Spanish wine, you can buy it in the market near the house - Ken's Market).Jessie's apartment is aesthetically pleasing, very clean and very close to all of the lively amenities of Ballard and Phinney Ridge.", 'And, Jessie was so easy to contact and pleasant.', 'Super clean, super comfortable. 
', 'There are a lot of really good restaurants and bars near by...', 'Jessie is really nice and helpful. 
', "It's really cozy and the neighbors are friendly.", 'The location is good.', "Jessie's place is the cutest little BNB ever!  ", 'Although we were only there to sleep mostly, it was clean and very cozy.  ', 'and I was completely blown away with this apartment.', 'The place is comfortable, relaxing, clean, and splendidly fitted with funky decor art and features that make you feel right at home.', 'So comfortable!', 'The lounge area and kitchen had everything I needed for my stay', 'The bar is a nice touch to the house, and although I did not partake in the beverages, it was nice to have the option to have a drink if I needed it.', 'The location is excellent, with a few minutes up the road you arrive to an amazing organic market where I managed to pick up dinner several nights for under $10.', 'Jessie has put a lot of thought into the place making it a very comfortable spot to stay.', "It is organized as a studio with the bedroom separated by a sliding partition, but that's probably to comply with the fire code, because the open floor plan is at least as big as a good-sized 1 bedroom apartment.  ", 'Other nice features which aren't obvious until you get there include an extra-wide range/oven (36" instead of the typical 30"), plentiful on-street parking, a very soft and comfortable bed, lots of bright lighting options, fast & effective heaters, and a double-basin kitchen sink with a waste disposer.  ', 'PCC, the best organic grocery in Seattle is within walking distance (about 1km).', 'The apartment was also very clean, and very recently remodeled, with many well-chosen, high-quality materials.  ', "you're thinking from the pictures that this place is too good to be true", 'Not only was it great to have a "home base" ready for us as soon as we arrived in town, but we found the apt to be beautiful, clean, and spacious.  ', 'Having access to Netflix was also a bonus that we thoroughly enjoyed ;)  ', 'Everything worked out well and the neighbourhood was great for our trip.', 'Everything you might need really is within a very short walk.', 'Everything one needs is within a brief walk: coffee, grub, groceries, and a major bus line.', 'Very private feeling; instantly felt like home.', 'Very rewarding maiden voyage into AirBNB', 'Greenwood has everything you need a few minutes away - grocery stores, bars and plenty of restaurants. 

', 'No cleaning supplies provided so it was tricky to keep the place clean for longer stays.', "- Lacking in general supplies: toilet roll, washing up liquid, oven tray, smoke detector

All in all - it's in a great location at a great price.", "If you're looking for a great value apartment to use as a base for exploring Seattle this would be perfect.", 'Roomy, modern and clean.  ', 'Nicely done. 

', 'My husbands Verizon Galaxy and laptop worked fine but my T-Mobile Ipad and  would not connect to the internet.    ', 'The place is big and very well done.', 'Coordinating everything was/is easy.', 'Very professional.', 'It was spacious and had all we need!This apartment was comfortable and for the price, it served us well while we visited Seattle!', 'Nothing bad to say.', 'Highly recommended!The apartment was very nice.  ', 'It was clean and spacious.  ', 'Jessie has this place looking very nice. 
', 'The neighborhood was very quiet and the bus stop was close by.  ', 'The basement apartment is beautiful and very spacious, although there is A lot of sound transfer from upstairs to the basement.', 'Easy bus trip to downtown.', 'However there are no cleaning supplies(even dish soap or a broom) so for a longer stay this can be difficult.', 'Neighborhood was nice and quite.', 'Walking distance to everything', 'and I mean everything.', 'Cass was nice and very easy going.', 'The listing description was accurate; everything was as expected!', 'Was able to meet Cass and she was super friendly and accomodating.', 'Overall, clean, comfy and cozy!Cass was great.  ', "The location is perfect if you're looking for a quiet place to stay while visiting the city.  ", 'It was everything that was described in the posting and more.', 'The neighborhood is just perfect for what we were looking for, so close to so many great places to eat and super close to downtown.', 'Cass was very clear on her expectations and house rules which makes it easy to be a good guest!', 'We had the pleasure of meeting her and her roommate and they were both very nice, vibrant people with lots of suggestions for us.', 'Case was very responsive though so that was great.', 'Great place, great location, Cass was very responsive to messages.', 'Place was great clean and as advertised.', 'This was a great little apartment!', 'The apartment itself is beautiful just enough room for 2 people!', 'There was also access to a computer which was really nice!', 'but she was very responsive to any needs we had via messaging! 

', 'Phinney Ridge is a quaint little neighborhood!', 'Cass was friendly and helpful...', 'We had a couple of little dramas during our stay, but nothing was a problem to fix at all.', 'The apartment was awesome and had everything we needed.', 'everyone was incredibly friendly, and everything we needed was within walking distance, bus stop to town was close too which was great.', 'Would be good for a very short stay I expect.', 'Very nice neighbourhood.', 'Parking was easy and there were always a few spots right out front and if you know Seattle, this is quite a plus.  ', 'The location is great, just a (very) short walk to bars, restaurants, and an amazing market.', 'The neighborhood is nice and quiet, it was truly a joy to stay here for 2+ weeks!']

sents_0.5:
['Great little "urban farm" that's walking distance from Fremont and easy access to Ballard and downtown.', 'Nice spacious kitchen and beautiful yard.', 'The house was perfect.  ', 'The location was just up the hill from all the restaurants in Fremont and the Burke-Gilman Trail, allowing us lots of freedom to walk and bike around beaufitul north Seattle.  ', 'Very clean and comfortable to live in.  ', 'And we found a surprise bag of chocolates with a sweet note at our door mid-stay.  ', 'Overall, if you are looking for a place to truly experience Seattle life - walking, biking, eating in quirky Fremont, busing downtown, caring for chickens (and eating their fresh eggs) - this is the place for you.', "We enjoyed fresh eggs and honey from Caroline and Paul's hives for breakfast.", 'Everything was clean.', 'The stay comes with some animal-feeding duties for the chickens and ducks they keep in their yard so you should only stay here if you like animals and caring for them.', 'They also have a cat who takes care of herself pretty well, with her own little cat door in and out of the house.', 'We were very fortunate to enjoy beautiful weather our entire time in Washington, and Seattle was bathed in glorious sunlight.', 'Caroline was an impeccable hostess: organized, informative, and incredibly friendly.', 'Upon arrival, we found a hand-written note encouraging us to consider her home our home for the duration of our stay--what a considerate and warm touch!', "Living in a stranger's home can be a bit awkward, and there was none of that with Caroline and Paul.", "Our stay was easy, fun, and a learning experience: we'd never enjoyed duck eggs before, which was quite a treat.", 'The neighborhood was quiet and friendly; we chatted with a neighbor and always found parking on the street and fun in Fremont.', 'The house was really good fun and in a great location for us.', "I left the tea behind and couldn't resist the fresh coffee beans and hand grinder each morning.  ", "We had a little family reunion at Caroline's lovely home in (email hidden)t up with our son and his wife for Christmas.", 'The  house was perfect, great location, plenty of room, great spots to sit and visit and a dining room table for means, games and coffee.', 'Lovely view, duck eggs (thanks  girls), and nice neighbors.', 'We cooked, talked, walked, and had a rockin good time.', 'My friend and I thoroughly enjoyed staying here.  ', 'We cannot say enough how much we enjoyed dotting our day with "what are the ducks doing??"  ', 'There were good eateries and places to get coffee/drinks in the neighborhood and the PCC grocery store is a gem.  ', 'We are very happy we opted for the Airbnb option over a hotel.  ', 'Far enough away to be quiet, but close enough to stumble home from nano breweries, and get the most delicious coffee in the morning that Seattle has to offer.  ', 'The Brewery Cafe was a big hit!!  ', "Caroline's home was everything that she said it would be.  ", 'It was easy to find, comfortable and pleasant.', "We didn't take care of the ducks, but enjoyed them when we were there at the house.", 'The neighbors were friendly, too.  
', 'Thanks Caroline very much.', 'We had everything we needed in the house, and there were plenty of restaurants within walking distance.', 'the railing up there is a little wobbly!

', 'It put a smile on my face at the beginning of each day, watching them parade out of their coop and into their little pond :)', "Caroline did offer to have the neighbors care for the ducks if we preferred, and in fact they did help out one evening when we couldn't be there.", 'We met said neighbors, and they were super friendly - they even invited us to join their bonfire!', 'They keep to themselves.', "Thank you Caroline - if I ever make it back to Seattle, I'm checking with you first to see if your place is available!rCaroline and Paul's home was perfect for our stay in Seattle.  ", 'The kitchen had everything you needed and more.  ', 'We loved the amazing energy of the home and how comfortable we felt staying there.  ', 'The ducks were soooo much fun to wake up to every morning, especially for our two little girls who loved following them around the yard.  ', 'The house was very cosy and in a great spot for visiting my family in Ballard (as well as close to the city).  ', 'Caroline is a great host and very helpful with information throughout the whole process.', 'It was really nice coming back from a long day of walking and sight seeing and being greeted with a comfy, cozy home.', "The house was adorable, clean and the pet ducks were a great bonus!Caroline's house was so visitor friendly!", 'Everything.', 'Thanks for letting us use your home!House is exactly as advertised, very comfortable and very clean.', 'Caroline was an excellent host providing recommendations on things to do and even a stock of breat butter and cheese which along with the fresh duck eggs made for great breakfast!', 'Nice to see a local Seattle neighborhood too while still very accessible to Downtown and nearby Ballard.', 'So nice to have a nice place to go back to that also has some fun aspects for my toddler! 
', "DCaroline and Paul's cozy home in the wonderfully quirky Fremont neighborhood was everything we wanted in a vacation spot.  ", "The house was spotless and had everything we needed for our meals, relaxation, and a good nights' rest.  ", 'Caroline was very responsive to our emails and easy to work with.  ', 'It was exactly the space we needed for the two kids and the location was perfect.', 'Easy walking distance to the zoo and good bus connections to Downtown, Ballard and the University area.', 'We enjoyed ourselves very much.', 'Very entertaining.', 'The house was perfect for our family Thanksgiving celebration.  ', 'House was clean.', 'Close to good restaurants.  ', 'Good music selection.', 'Bed was comfortable and had warm blankets.  ', 'The brochures were a nice touch. ['Deb was timely, helpful, and easy to communicate with.', 'Her house was clean and accessible.', "Deb's space was absolutely perfect for our purposes, and quite roomy.  ", 'The amount of sleeping space was impressive and diverse and felt very cozy.  ', 'The availability of immediate street parking was great, and the location was near enough to lots of districts in Seattle proper.  ', 'The house is warm and has a homey feel in it.', 'Kitchen, refrigerator, bathrooms, living room, bedrooms were all well groomed.', 'It was a little chilly at night', 'but, she left heated blankets for us!', 'Very clear space once checked-in.', 'As "First-time Airbnb-ers" it was totally perfect.
', 'Also the house is within walking distance of a grocery store which was very handy.
', 'Note however that this is not like getting a vacation rental house where everything is brand new and set up just for you. ', "But if you are looking for a luxury vacation rental home, need lots and lots of closet space., and/or just can't survive without A/C..", 'Very old house, photos made it look a lot nicer.', 'host not very personable.', 'Our family of five stayed here for 2 nights and Deb made sure we had everything we needed and was very helpful and friendly.

', 'If you like a good value house, in a good neighbourhood, handy for Safeway which has everything you need in a homely and quirky way', 'I found the bedrooms large and well appointed with nice sheets and plenty of blankets for the cold Seattle evenings.  ', 'This house was good for our family for two reasons: It is on the ground floor with no steps. ', "Great overall experience!Deb's home is cute, cozy, and comfortable.", "She left us fresh blueberries from her sister's farm on the first day!", 'The neighborhood is quiet and safe.', "Perfect for our young/artsy group!our whole family of 6 stayed at Deb's artistic home for 1 night .we", 'met with Deb and she showed everything that we needed to know about her space and was friendly.', 'The space was very clean and enjoyable for all of (website hidden) is interesting to look at all that is part of the house ...very whimsical!', 'It worked well for our family to stay there , it is very quiet neighborhood and close to Safeway for any grocery needs.']

sents_0.5:
['She was very responsive both prior to and during the visit.  ', 'Anne introduced herself, but left us to ourselves while we were there, and was very respectful of our space and privacy.', 'The apartment was beautiful, just as pictured, and very comfortable.  ', 'The neighborhood was ideal for us - a little bit removed from downtown, so quiet, yet still accessible through public transportation, with several nice restaurants within walking distance.   ', 'The apartment is the downstairs of her house and is obviously recently remodeled with great care.', 'Despite being downstairs (partial basement) the space is very light and very spacious.', 'The apartment seems like a high-end hotel suite - the linen on the bed is very high quality, the bathroom is great, the living room/dining room is comfortable with very nice furniture.', 'In short, the space is incredibly nice and we were very happy staying there.
', 'Anne was also a very nice host.', 'She accommodated a change for us in the stay and was easy to communicate with before the stay.', 'She has made a little folder for the neighborhood and we walked to several of the recommended places.', 'The apartment is within easy walking distance to very nice restaurants and cafes.', "I would very much recommend staying at Anne's apartment.", 'Anne made me feel very welcome.  ', "The apartment was very well appointed and I could have cooked for an army with all the dishes provided, but I didn't.  ", 'The space, which appears newly remodeled, is clean, quiet and elegant and is lacking nothing.  ', "The location is really amazing--quiet, safe neighborhood streets accessible to good food, coffee and great ice cream--all life's essentials. 

", 'Anne was great about keeping in touch, laying out expectations and her whole listing is spot on.', 'Very tastefully redone.', 'We had a car so it was easy to find.  ', 'The apartment is very quiet and had everything that we needed for a comfortable three day visit.  ', 'It was spotless which is obviously a high priority for Anne.  ', 'Super clean and aesthetically pleasing it', 'was a perfect place to explore Seattle.', 'It was very easy to check in and out and Anne was a superb host who gave us tips about her city when we needed as well as plenty of space and privacy .', 'The apartment was clean and well-stocked, and she gave us great information on places to go in the city.', 'It is a very clean, well stocked and spacious one bedroom in a great location.', 'Super close to everything we wanted to do.', 'Very cute neighborhood that is extremely quiet and full of charm.', 'Great neighborhood, lovely apartment, warm, helpful, responsive and welcoming host.', 'Comfortable bed, newly renovated apartment.', 'Anne was very informative and professional.', "I love Anne's apartment which is large and super clean!", 'She almost provided everything we needed.', 'The restaurants in neighbourhood are quite good.', 'It was a nice experience staying there.', "The Urban Oasis has all of the amenities you'd need and a nice level of privacy.", 'The place was perfect for our little family.  ', 'It was clean and up to date.  ', 'Thanks Anne!The apartment is huge and very clean.  ', "Everything looks like it's new", 'and you can always find something good to eat in the neighborhood.

', 'Clean and very spacious, the pictures do not do it justice.', 'We had a rental car during our stay and parking was quite easy on the street.', 'Anne was a gracious host, she was easy and fun to chat with if we needed but let us do our own thing which was nice.', 'Very open plan and very clean inside.', 'It was so nice having our own apartment for the time we were there.', 'Everything was so clean, which I appreciate, as well as being comfortable and homey.', 'Anne had many nice amenities and details throughout the apartment.', 'Fully stocked kitchen, wonderful bathroom, beautiful large sofa, and comfortable bed.  ', 'she even had an urgent care number listed if needed.', 'The apartment was very quiet, but you could hear people walking above in the house easily.', 'The place was perfect: clean and comfortable.', 'We had everything we needed.', 'Anne was responsive and her instructions were easy and straightforward.', 'you had all the services needed like nice park, grocery store, restaurants etc.', 'And the place itself was a true oasis, and decorated with such a good style!', 'Many thanks to Anne, absolutely the best place on our three week road trip in States & CAN.

', "Anne's flat was very welcoming and cosy.", 'Everything was spotless, the furnishings elegant and functional and the kitchen well stocked.', "The neighbourhood is very quiet but has plenty of restaurant options nearby; it's a short 15 minute drive to downtown Seattle.", "It wasn't entirely clear to us from the description of the flat that it is in a basement, but a reasonable amount of natural light gets in and as noted the flat is very nicely arranged, so that surprise ended up being a minor disappointment.", 'Urban Oasis was the perfect place to stay in Seattle.', 'The apartment was spotlessly clean and very well organized.', 'Ann was the perfect host and responded very quickly to our queries.', 'Her home was clean and comfortable in an amazing location!', 'The place and the location was perfect to discover Seattle.', 'Within a block from the apartment there are great restaurants and coffee places as well as some cool shops and Anne had created a really good list with the best places.', 'The apartment had everything you need and was very clean and tidy.', 'John and I had a wonderful and very relaxing stay in this gem of an Airbnb accommodation.', 'The apartment was really comfortable and very stylishly decorated with plenty of space inside and with a small front yard where we enjoyed our morning coffee while watching people and dogs walking by.', 'The location was perfect too, in walking distance to several really good restaurants, bars, coffee shops and ice cream places.  ', 'The host, Anne had provided us with plenty of information on how to get around and with lots of good restaurant recommendations.', 'We would definitely recommend the Urban Oasis for anyone visiting Seattle for a getaway or a longer stay as it immediately feels like your own home in a very pleasant neighbourhood.', "After dinner each night we enjoyed walking around the Capitol Hill neighborhood, there's lots of beautiful houses to check out and it felt like a very safe and welcoming neighborhood.", 'The apartment itself is very nice, well designed, and completely updated.', "It's easy to get in and out, private, and very quiet", 'The kitchen is nice and full of whatever utensils you need.', "The place even had a nice TV (with cable), and a sound system (which we didn't get to test out).
", 'Urban Oasis was just as the name suggests, a home away from home, clean with attractive interior design on a quiet street accessible to various shops, markets, restaurants, and parks.', 'This was a great place in a lovely neighborhood with great restaurants/coffee shops within easy walking distance.  ', 'Space was fully furnished with kitchen/laundry and everything you might need.
', "15 minutes from the downtown area/Space Needle/Pike's Market and not hard to find at all.  ", 'Parking on street was always easy to find.', 'Just a beautiful little stay in Capitol Hill!', 'Anne was fabulous, exceptionally informative, and an impeccable host - straight down to the fresh cookies that awaited my arrival.', "Anne's home was comfortable and as welcoming as herself!", 'The apartment has a built-in, automatic fireplace which was perfect during a light Seattle rainstorm.  ', "It's quite large with all the accommodations one would need- kitchen, stocked bathroom, even a laundry room.  ", 'It was walking distance to everything in Cap Hill, which was perfect.', 'Anne left easy to follow directions too.', 'a well appointed bedroom and bathroom and even laundry if you need to get it done on the go.', 'The suite is exactly as listed - brand new, clean and cozy.', 'And the neighbourhood is perfect - centrally located for getting around Seattle, and convenient for just going out for a walk and having a dinner, a drink or a coffee at one of several great restaurants and cafes on 19th Ave.']

['The apartment was exactly as described: simple, but exceptionally clean and comfortable.', 'It was clean and welcoming!', "I had a very pleasant stay at Susanna's duplex.", 'With good bus routes nearby, I got around easily without a car.', 'The kitchen is minimally stocked with cookware and dishes, so it might be difficult to host a dinner party there, but I had everything I needed.', 'She is very sweet, welcoming, and available all the time to answer my questions.', 'She makes sure that my stay is comfortable and I have what I need.', 'The apartment is super clean and beautiful.', 'The whole unit has a great air flow and enough windows to allow natural lights getting in.', 'The apartment is close to both local and Asian grocery stores; it is located in a great neighborhood and very close to any point of interest in Seattle.', 'Susanna was a very gracious host.  ', 'we appreciated it very much!

', ':)

Cannot say enough about how clean and neat this apartment was.  ', "And while the decor is minimalism at its finest, Susanna has added some nice touches, it doesn't mean that quality has been sacrificed.  ", 'We loved the organic teas and spa-like bath soap.  ', 'And the washer/dryer are awesome - very powerful yet energy efficient', 'and we appreciated being able to wash our clothes during our travels.', 'And we slept like babies in the amazingly comfortable firm bed - and the pillows were perfection.', 'We love to go for walks, and while it is one block to a busy street that was not very pretty to look at, simply heading in the other direction brought us through quiet streets.  ', "We didn't know until we left that if we would have kept on going in that direction we would have run into some very cute restaurants and bars.  ", 'It was very clean and even more spacious than the pictures.', 'I would definitely stay at her place on my next visit to Seattle!Susanna was a good and kind host.', 'She was easy to reach and tried to resolve whatever issue there was.', 'Her place was very comfortable and exactly what was shown in the picture.', 'Clean furniture, bathroom, kitchen, comfy bed, included wifi, and a parking spot - it has everything.', 'Also since I stayed for a while the new washer and dryer were perfect.', "Compared to NY, Seattle's summer is cooler and dry.", 'But there were still hot days in the peak of July but the place stayed completely cool throughout.', 'I also frequently ran in the nearby Green Lake Park - nice large park with tons of activities.', 'Susanna was very attentive and great in making sure everything is up to spec and even the little details like a fruit peeler is stocked in the kitchen (which I broke!)', 'She even made sure my UPS packages are safe when they left it on the doorsteps.', 'The place was very clean, close to cafés, restaurants, and a grocery store.', 'My wife and I stayed here for a few days and it was perfect for what we needed. 

', '-Susanna is awesome to deal with and very helpful and kind 
-easy access to downtown.', "15mins max on bus and you can also use car2go (get an account if you don't have one yet) so easy and awesome. 
", '-very clean and comfortable 
', 'it was clean, convenient and Susanna was an excellent host!', "We had a really good time staying at Susanna's place.", 'She was really accommodating, had great tips for us and even supplied our kids with some sand toys.', "I thoroughly enjoyed my stay in Susanna's suite.", 'It is also very clean, modern, and extremely comfortable, which was much appreciated.', 'As a host, Susanna was extremely accommodating, thoughtful, and easy to reach.', 'She went out of her way to make sure I had everything I needed in the unit, and was happy to answer my questions about the area.', 'Susanna made me feel very welcome.', 'It was very clean and quite spacious for a single traveler like me.', 'The washer and dryer are a big plus.', 'It was a short drive away from the park and easy access to other Seattle neighborhoods.', 'Her home was spare and minimal, but very clean and comfortable.', 'The place was very clean and comfortable as well.', 'We arrived via rental car, easy to find , right off a main road, only 15 to 20 min from Seattle.  ', 'The place was very clean, kitchen had what you needed(all most) expect small things like sugar and condiments  which would have been nice.', 'but it would be a nice addition.', 'it was a little warm, and unfortunately there is no a/c, but I think that is the norm in the north west coast.', 'Easy check in and check out.', 'This is a very pleasant and comfortable space, with plenty of room and a kitchen with everything you need.  ', '(Although who cooks when there are so many wonderful places to eat nearby?)  ', 'Near a main street, but very quiet.  ', 'No TV, but the WiFi made it easy to stream things on my laptop.  ', 'The apartment was clean, fully equipped, functional, quiet, very comfortable and in a great location.', 'Susanna was there to meet us as planned and gave us a warm welcome.', 'Susanna was very welcoming and showed me around the place when I showed up to check in.', 'The place was exactly as cute as pictured and provided a comfortable private sanctuary for the weekend.', 'it had a fine sized kitchen, washer and dryer, great bathroom, and comfortable bed.', 'The apartment itself had everything I needed and was very comfortable.', 'The apartment is quiet and has easy access to downtown.  ', 'and I was very comfortable.', 'When the weather got unusually hot she checked in to see if the apartment was still comfortable and offered to provide me with a fan.', 'The apartment was clean, the bed was comfortable, and the kitchen was good sized.', "The neighborhood seemed quiet and safe even though it's by a main street.", "There are some great shops just a few blocks away on Greenwood Ave, and there's super easy bus access right to the heart of downtown.", 'I would definitely stay here again if I return to Seattle!Susanna was very gracious to adjust our check in time when our flight was twice delayed.', 'She provided clear instructions verbally and in written form.', 'The guest house was clean, neatly furnished and exactly as advertised.', "We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will recommend Susanna's place to our friends.", "Really, Really lovely place; it was perfect, actually; an absolute bargain for the price - and the photos don't do it justice.  ", 'I mean SO nice, in ways both large (the onsite washer/dryer is a huge plus; made it possible to live a whole week out of just a carry-on)', 'and small (really nice bath fixtures, bedding, coffee & tea, current bus schedule,', 'Great location; quiet street, friendly neighbors, trivial to get downtown on the E-line and inexpensive to cab anywhere around.  ', "Most of all Susanna's just a lovely person - so warm and welcoming and kind", "(when I'd needed that for my week) - as well as a great host:  Makes sure you have & know everything you need - and if you need anything else, she's right next door - and beyond that, leaves you to your privacy / solitude aside from friendly waves and/or quick chats whenever passing one another in the driveway on the way in or out.  ", "Really couldn't have been happier or more thankful to Susanna for this stay - and apologies for not having left her a bottle of wine as I'd intended to say thanks (I'd been offered a lift to the airport and had to take it while the getting had been good).  ", 'Next time :-)Susanna provided a clean and comfortable duplex property.  ', 'The on-site parking was very nice because the adjacent residential street was often full of parked cars.  ', 'Access to the duplex was easy, just 1/2 block off the main street, but the commercial street was very busy so the city noise was ever present.  ', 'Good place Will definitely book again if I have the chance to visit SeattleHad a wonderful stay.']

['Debbie was wonderful and the apartment was a perfect, quiet getaway!', 'Very clean and comfortable.', 'She thought of every little necessities i.e. shampoo, coffee, creamer & soap.', 'Great location, easy parking, nice host!Staying in the Columbia City Apartment was the best decision we could have made for our house hunting trip to Seattle.', 'Good food and sight seeing attractions were easily accessible.', "It's well decorated, spacious, and clean.  ", "It's also located very close to some great amenities, including the Columbia City strip and a couple of big parks.  ", 'Debbie made check-in and check-out very easy, and also checked in after the first night to make sure everything was OK.  ', 'With the light rail fairly close, much of Seattle is just a short walk away (downtown, pike market, stadiums, airport, etc).I had a very positive experience with Airbnb and with my hostess, Debbie.', 'She was very prompt with information and helpful with all the details as well.', 'The apt is very quiet and neat as a pin.', 'The decor is comfortable with everything one might need for their stay.', 'Having beautiful Seward Park and Lake Washington in the back yard was nice too.', 'She went out of her way to make the stay comfortable, even cooked dinner one evening and invited me to join.  ', 'The location of this apartment is perfect - about a 15 dollar cab ride to downtown and walking distance to many shops, restaurants  and the light rail in Columbia City!', 'We had a wonderful time in Seattle, and we were so glad we stayed in this AirBnB. It was spacious and so clean!', 'The kitchen had everything you need to make meals, which we did twice a day.', 'There was even a closet in the bedroom, so we unpacked for the week.', 'This place has all the little things necessary for a very comfortable stay.', 'She was helpful and friendly throughout before and during my visit.

', "The apartment was comfortable, although head's up on the low ceiling.", "Debbie's apartment was easy to find, off street parking, quiet neighborhood.", 'It is a basement apartment, which was very nicely finished.', 'We had everything we needed, and more.', 'The photos were accurate - the place was spacious, comfortable, and very clean.', "Kitchen was fully stocked with everything you'd need to cook for yourself - but honestly we never did with all the fantastic restaurants nearby. 

", 'Debbie was the perfect host.', 'Friendly, communicative, and offered recommendations for what to do during our stay.', "Light rail is not too far away- while walking stop and smell the roses-- Lot's of interesting neighboring homes with nice gardens (some with with large sunflowers), organic vegetables, and cleverly designed one of a kind homes! 

", 'The bed and sofa was "ah" so comfortable!

', 'Debbie was very accommodating.   ', 'The mattress was a little too firm for my osteoarthritis and when Debbie found this out, she brought two extra soft pillows to see if that would help.  ', 'The place was clean and well mantained.  ', 'The apartment was very convenient in using the light rail to downtown Seattle.  ', 'It was very nice having an off street parking spot.  ', 'Very enjoyable stay!', 'the king sized bed was comfortable and the bedroom had small nook area for yoga in AMs..', 'ceiling is very low in areas.', 'Her apartment was clean and spacious and had exactly what we needed.', 'Without exaggeration, she had thought of everything needed to make our stay in Seattle enjoyable and worthwhile--from coffee beans, grinder, and French press, to a fully equipped kitchen, to reading material as well as DVDs, and to a nicely organized binder with maps, things to see in Seattle, information about the  main street of Columbia City with its many shops and restaurants, and instructions about the apartment.
      ', 'The apartment is unbelievably spacious, private, and very comfortable.', 'As a half-submerged basement apartment, it does still lack some natural light and, as one other reviewer noted, can present some problems for quite tall people (by my estimation, those 6'5" and taller) with its lower ceilings.', 'We recommend Debbie's apartment with great enthusiasm, especially for those under 60 and 6'5"!Debbie was great, very welcoming.  ', 'Also it stayed nice and cool with minimal help from a fan.', 'The room was comfortable and well appointed.', 'Everything was provided that a traveler would need and then some (iron/ironing board, q-tips, blow dryer, kitchen supplies, French press, coffee bean grinder etc).', 'The place was very clean, tastefully decorated, well equipped with all of the necessities.', 'The bed was very comfortable.', "Parking in the driveway and private entrance with coded lock was a plus, we didn't have to worry about loosing keys or locking ourselves out.", 'Debbie was a very attentive but not intrusive hostess.  ', 'She was available by text to answer any of our questions and it was very easy to communicate with her.', 'Lilla & Steven Debbie was a fantastic host, who thought of every possible detail to make our stay as comfortable as possible: Full stocked bathroom and kitchen, local guides and restaurant menus, books, DVDs, iron with board, and so much more.', 'Debbie, thank you very much for making our first Airbnb experience', 'The apartment is so well-kept and charming, and very spacious for 2 people.', 'It was very easy to communicate with Debbie beforehand and during our visit.', 'Plus, it is within walking distance of the light rail, which made it very easy to get there from the airport. 

', 'We also appreciated the little treats that Debbie left for us!', 'The place was really cute and cozy, and had everything we needed.', 'And the light rail was an easy 10 minute walk from the house and was super convenient to get around on, and go downtown.', 'Debbie was super helpful, and easy contacted by text.', 'Debbie was an absolute gem and made our brief stay VERY easy!', 'Check in/check out was flexible and her apartment was perfect.', 'Seriously...when I say perfect, it was the right size and cozy for the two of us traveling.', 'Two added pluses: Parking available in the front/or separate driveway and easy access/egress with lock.

', 'Combined with price and good location, this would be a place we highly recommend.

', 'She was very welcoming and texted us to provide all of the pertinent details a few days prior to our stay.  ', 'We loved her DVD (The Big Lebowski!)', 'Extra towels and blankets, coffee, breakfast items, and even q-tips were thoughtfully provided.
